Package com.pos.sdk.printer.models

Class TextPrintLine

java.lang.Object
com.pos.sdk.printer.models.PrintLine
com.pos.sdk.printer.models.TextPrintLine
public class TextPrintLine extends PrintLine
Text line abstraction for POIPrinterManager.

  • Constructor Details

    • TextPrintLine

      public TextPrintLine()
      Default constructor. Generates a default size (24.0f), left aligned empty text line.

    • TextPrintLine

      public TextPrintLine(String content)
      Generates a default size (24.0f), left aligned text line with the given content.
      Parameters:
      content - Line text.

    • TextPrintLine

      public TextPrintLine(String content, int position)
      Generates a default size (24.0f) text line with the given context and line alignment.
      Parameters:
      content - Line text.
      position - Line alignment. 0 for left aligned, 1 for center aligned, 2 for right aligned.

    • TextPrintLine

      public TextPrintLine(String content, int position, int size)
      Generates a text line with the given text, alignment and text size.
      Parameters:
      content - Line text.
      position - Line alignment. 0 for left aligned, 1 for center aligned, 2 for right aligned.
      size - Text size.

    • TextPrintLine

      public TextPrintLine(String content, int position, int size, boolean bold)
      Generates a text line with the given text, alignment and text size.
      Parameters:
      content - Line text.
      position - Line alignment. 0 for left aligned, 1 for center aligned, 2 for right aligned.
      size - Text size.
      bold - Bold text. True for bold text, false otherwise.

    • TextPrintLine

      public TextPrintLine(String content, int position, int size, boolean bold, boolean italic)
      Generates a text line with the given text, alignment and text size.
      Parameters:
      content - Line text.
      position - Line alignment. 0 for left aligned, 1 for center aligned, 2 for right aligned.
      size - Text size.
      bold - Bold text. True for bold text, false otherwise.
      italic - Italic text. True for italic text, false otherwise.

    • TextPrintLine

      public TextPrintLine(String content, int position, int size, boolean bold, boolean italic, boolean invert)
      Generates a text line with the given text, alignment and text size.
      Parameters:
      content - Line text.
      position - Line alignment. 0 for left aligned, 1 for center aligned, 2 for right aligned.
      size - Text size.
      bold - Bold text. True for bold text, false otherwise.
      italic - Italic text. True for italic text, false otherwise.
      invert - Invert line color. True to invert colors, false otherwise.

    • TextPrintLine

      public TextPrintLine(String content, int position, int size, boolean bold, boolean italic, boolean invert, boolean mirrorInvertY)
      Generates a text line with the given text, alignment and text size.
      Parameters:
      content - Line text.
      position - Line alignment. 0 for left aligned, 1 for center aligned, 2 for right aligned.
      size - Text size.
      bold - Bold text. True for bold text, false otherwise.
      italic - Italic text. True for italic text, false otherwise.
      invert - Invert line color. True to invert colors, false otherwise.
      mirrorInvertY - Mirrors text. True to mirror text, false otherwise.
